  Load packages and import data
```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, data.table, coloc,TwoSampleMR, ggpubr, 
               ieugwasr, rio, here)

source("code/Functions.R")

here::i_am("analyses/JAK2.Rmd")

```

# eQTL

Import data 
```{r}
JAK2_eqtl <- import_data("data/export/JAK2_eqtl_TwoSampleMR.csv", 
                         "data/export/JAK2_T1D_TwoSampleMR.csv", has_beta = FALSE)
```


## Manhattan plots
```{r}
#create Manhattan plots with vertical lines indicating the selected area (see below 2.4)
manhattan_plots(JAK2_eqtl, gene_start = 4985033, 
                gene_end=5128183, 
                title = "JAK2")
```

## Coloc assuming 1 causal variant

```{r}
analyze_coloc_eqtl(JAK2_eqtl)
```
